    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkReflections()
      Override abstract method in lawnlayer.Enemy; the Beetle enemy reflects off of grass and concrete but upon colliding with grass it transforms that grass tile back into soil.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Beetle

        public Beetle(App app,
              processing.core.PImage sprite,
              java.lang.String spawn)
        Creates a Beetle object with a specific PImage as a sprite and a specific spawn type ("random" or coordinates).
        Parameters:
        app - the PApplet object
        sprite - the specific PImage sprite used for the mob
        spawn - either "random" or coordinates
